name.zh_CN: IKEA Stock Availability Checker (宜家库存快速查询)
name.zh_TW: IKEA Stock Availability Checker (宜家庫存快速查詢)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get all stock availability for current IKEA product in your selected country
short.zh_CN: 显示当前宜家产品所有区域的库存状况
short.zh_TW: 顯示當前宜家產品所有區域的庫存狀況

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aug 31, 2020 outdated warning: IKEA has updated its website with new API and new method to get stock information. This extension won't work until I have enough time to follow this change.

Get all stock availability for current IKEA product in your selected country.

Updates

# Dec 10, 2018
- Update support for IKEA China
long.zh_CN,zh_TW: Get all stock availability for current IKEA product in your selected country.
